name: From Space: Mission Pack - Concrete Jungle
summary: Mission Pack: Concrete Jungle is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Skyline and Hospital), a weapon (Medic Gun), 2 items (Decoy Soldier and Ice Maker), and a perk (Resurrection Perk).
